thread.title: Qatar- Ahlibank celebrates Garangao night with customers
thread.title_full: Qatar- Ahlibank celebrates Garangao night with customers | MENAFN.COM

author: Gulf Times
title: Qatar- Ahlibank celebrates Garangao night with customers
text:
(MENAFN - Gulf Times) Ahlibank has celebrated Garangao night, one of the popular traditions in Qatar and the Gulf, by distributing special Garangao boxes to its customers' children at all its branches. Hassan al-Efranji, head of retail banking services, said: "Garangao is a very important social tradition in Qatar and I am delighted that Ahlibank was able to provide Garangao boxes for the children of our customers within the local community we serve." The initiative is part of Ahlibank's commitment to be "in the heart of the 

community", according to a statement. "Ahlibank is keen to support such events, which reflect our commitment to the local community," al-Efranji added.
